inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('ConcealmentIgnoring', 'Stackable', 40); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Blind Fighting
description: You gain a bonus to fighting against enemies affected by concealment.  You ignore up to 40 points of any target's personal concealment in combat.
